original_text: When my servants complain against me, I have always been fair to them. When my servants complain against me,
korean_text: 만일 남종이나 여종이 나와 더불어 쟁론할 때에 내가 그의 권리를 저버렸다면

sentences.original_text: When my servants complain against me
I have always been fair to them
When my servants complain against me
